HierarchicalGraph<N> - Interface in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa
A HierarchicalGraph is a multilevel graph that can be traversed by a HierarchicalPathFinder at any level of its hierarchy.
HierarchicalPathFinder<N> - Class in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa
A HierarchicalPathFinder can find a path in an arbitrary HierarchicalGraph using the given PathFinder, known as level path finder, on each level of the hierarchy.
